      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove(Move from,
                        Move to)
        Description copied from interface: GameState
        Make a move in the GameState. This method modifies the current object such that the move is made (if valid) and all rule results (side effects) are taken into account
        Specified by:
        makeMove in interface GameState
        Parameters:
        from - the location to move from (ignored in some games)
        to - the location to move to
        Returns:
        true if the move was valid, false otherwise
